posts.post_content:
Just because they kept the flavor text, I think they should print an Akroma variant called Akroma, Merciless Angel. Maybe not, though.
  
   
May see play in Extended with blue artifact mana acceleration(?).
  
   
The only downsides to this in EDH is that it's colorless and Legendary (so any player can play it and if someone else does, they blow up) and artifact removal is so easy to come by.
  
   
5/5

Posted By: mdbaldw (8/5/2012 1:58:55 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: It is pretty awesome, but there is one problem.... It doesn't make creatures into threats, it only makes threats into larger threats. if you have a 1/1 it becomes cool, but that little wimp isn't gonnna be very much stronger after an akroma's memoria. However, if you have an 8/8 beatin' face, he starts being a very real threat and ignores the usual "dies to removal" and "it needs trample or else it'll get chump blocked" arguments. 4/5, because it's really just a win-more card
posts.html:
